title: A Dangerous Man | Steven Seagal | Full Movie | Action Crime Thriller

sources.title: A Dangerous Man | Steven Seagal | Full Movie | Action Crime Thriller
sources.description:
A Dangerous Man - Shane listens as a judge tells him that the State of Arizona’s apologizes for him spending the last fifteen years in jail for a murder he didn’t commit. Shane quickly finds himself the victim of a street robbery, taking out his two attackers and saving a girl in the mist of a drug trade. He must fight his way through the town and take the girl to safety.
2009.  Stars: Steven Seagal, Marlaina Mah, Vitaly Kravchenko
*Licensed from Voltage Pictures. All rights reserved*
